ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] next questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Really Depends on what/where you are fighting. Charm fighting is VERY effective in Rathe Mnts with giants. I enjoyed fear kiting until about 30th level when I
ygData.messageBody:
Really Depends on what/where you are fighting. Charm fighting is VERY
effective in Rathe Mnts with giants. I enjoyed fear kiting until about 30th
level when I realized that my non-twinked weapon damage was too low to be
effective. If you have enough room to do it safely you can do an all
instrument attack with the fear kite.

*****
There is a high price for living in a free society.
On Sept.11, 2001 we paid too much, we have some change coming....Let's go
get it.
*****

-----Original Message-----
From: Katye and Brandon [mailto:landmax13@...]
Sent: Friday, December 28, 2001 8:56 AM
To: Bard List
Subject: [eqbards] next questions


OK, got the brass thing under control...

now for kiting

How/where do ya'll do kiting?

Do you prefer charm kiting or fear kiting?

Do you switch weapons as well?

Do you beg a sow or are you best off without?

Do you do more than one mob?

Anyone?

Any good sites that talk about it?

????

Any info ya'll are willing to share I'm up for.

Raub Zaumbie
31st lvl songster
e. marr server
